html: PG&E customers – PG&E is warning of a phone scam where callers demand payment for supposedly past-due bills & threaten to disconnect your electricity. If you receive this call, hang up & call local police or contact PG&E at 1-800-743-5000. Never give out personal info by phone!pic.twitter.com/pKyp5sOTHc
text: PG&E customers – PG&E is warning of a phone scam where callers demand payment for supposedly past-due bills & threaten to disconnect your electricity. If you receive this call, hang up & call local police or contact PG&E at 1-800-743-5000. Never give out personal info by phone!pic.twitter.com/pKyp5sOTHc

html: Nearly 5 years ago, our district was rocked by the South Napa Earthquake, which left more than 1,500 homes seriously damaged. Disasters in our district and across our nation are devastating and we must do everything we can right now to prepare and mitigate their harmful impacts.

html: Today we took an historic step toward passing #HR8 and expanding background checks to help keep our communities safe from gun violence. Here’s a message from today’s markup that I wanted to share.pic.twitter.com/rvk87SM9GV
text: Today we took an historic step toward passing #HR8 and expanding background checks to help keep our communities safe from gun violence. Here’s a message from today’s markup that I wanted to share.pic.twitter.com/rvk87SM9GV

html: BREAKING: The @HouseJudiciary just passed #HR8—which will make universal background checks law. We proudly stand by @SpeakerPelosi, @RepJerryNadler, @WhipClyburn and @RepThompson. When this bill passes the House, the Senate should follow their lead. #gunsafetynow
text:
BREAKING: The @HouseJudiciary just passed #HR8—which will make universal background checks law.

We proudly stand by @SpeakerPelosi, @RepJerryNadler, @WhipClyburn and @RepThompson. When this bill passes the House, the Senate should follow their lead. #gunsafetynow

html: BREAKING: @HouseJudiciary just passed #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act. This is the first major gun violence prevention legislation to pass the Committee in several decades. #EndGunViolence
text: BREAKING: @HouseJudiciary just passed #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act. This is the first major gun violence prevention legislation to pass the Committee in several decades. #EndGunViolence

html: BREAKING NEWS: The @HouseJudiciary just finished a markup on #HR8, my bipartisan bill to expand background checks. This bill now heads to the Floor for a vote. Finally, we have taken real action to combat gun violence.pic.twitter.com/oNVEJ5ilWw
text: BREAKING NEWS: The @HouseJudiciary just finished a markup on #HR8, my bipartisan bill to expand background checks. This bill now heads to the Floor for a vote. Finally, we have taken real action to combat gun violence.pic.twitter.com/oNVEJ5ilWw

html: Judiciary Republicans have stalled the markup of #HR8 for 10hrs. Judiciary Dems just shutdown debate to force a vote on #HR8. When #HR8 passes, this will be the 1st time in several decades that gun violence prevention legislation has passed out of the Committee. #EndGunViolence

html: His own story and the stories of far too many survivors he has cared for in the emergency department are powerful reminders of the work we must do to help prevent future tragedies.
text: His own story and the stories of far too many survivors he has cared for in the emergency department are powerful reminders of the work we must do to help prevent future tragedies.

html: Dr. Sakran knows the lasting trauma gun violence has on its victims and he has dedicated his life to caring for them. He has seen it as a first responder, as a surgeon in the emergency department, and firsthand as a survivor of gun violence himself.
text: Dr. Sakran knows the lasting trauma gun violence has on its victims and he has dedicated his life to caring for them. He has seen it as a first responder, as a surgeon in the emergency department, and firsthand as a survivor of gun violence himself.

html: Yesterday I voted to reopen the government, including the IRS, to assure families in our district that they can get their tax refund without issue, when they need it.
text: Yesterday I voted to reopen the government, including the IRS, to assure families in our district that they can get their tax refund without issue, when they need it.

html: IRS has never processed returns through a shutdown and I will monitor their progress closely in case they encounter any issues — I am concerned that an IRS that is short-staffed with unpaid employees is not in the best position to ensure a smooth filing season.
text: IRS has never processed returns through a shutdown and I will monitor their progress closely in case they encounter any issues — I am concerned that an IRS that is short-staffed with unpaid employees is not in the best position to ensure a smooth filing season.

html: Every year, more than 13 million California families get an average tax return of about $2,900. The Treasury Department has said they will bring furloughed employees back to work continue to process returns despite the shutdown.
text: Every year, more than 13 million California families get an average tax return of about $2,900. The Treasury Department has said they will bring furloughed employees back to work continue to process returns despite the shutdown.

html: 8 years ago, 6 lives were taken at the hands of gun violence in Tucson. Many others were injured including Congresswoman Gabby Giffords. We honor them with action including #HR8 which would expand Brady background checks. Let’s help pass this life-saving law in their honor.

html: “If you’re driving on a highway and the car in front of you stops short, and you slam on brakes and realize that you’re going to hit the guy no matter what, that’s not the time to take your foot off the brake,” said Sterman. “And you certainly don’t step on the gas.”
text: “If you’re driving on a highway and the car in front of you stops short, and you slam on brakes and realize that you’re going to hit the guy no matter what, that’s not the time to take your foot off the brake,” said Sterman. “And you certainly don’t step on the gas.”

html: Today as we watch fires rage across California we send our thoughts to those whose lives have been turned inside out by the Paradise, Woolsey and Camp Fires. I pledge to work with the entire California delegation to bring back any federal assistance we can to help recover.

html: During #MIAW take a moment to find out what you can do to help #curestigma and remember that you are not alone.
